origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CloudCustomerAPI.get_customer_growth', 'description': 'This function retrieves the customer growth data for a specified cloud service provider in a given year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cloud service provider, e.g., Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the customer growth data is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'customer_growth', 'description': 'The percentage increase in customers for the specified company in the given year.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
接下来，获取亚马逊AWS的客户增长数据。
